price: Nokorε sε, obi a ͻsεe (adeε) basabasa no ne nua ne abonsamfoͻ no, na ͻbonsam ayi ne Wura Nyankopͻn boniayε.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَٰنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِرَبِّهِۦ كَفُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-mubadhirīna kānū ikh'wāna al-shayāṭīni wakāna al-shayṭānu lirabbihi kafūran
